verses.verse: As <S%H7950>snow<s%> in <S%H7019>summer<s%>, and as <S%H4306>rain<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, so <S%H3519>honor<s%> is not <S%H5000>seemly<s%> for a <S%H3684>fool<s%>.
As the <S%H6833>bird<s%> by <S%H5110>wandering<s%>, as the <S%H1866>swallow<s%> by <S%H5774>flying<s%>, so the <S%H7045>curse<s%> <S%H2600>causeless<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%>.
A <S%H7752>whip<s%> for the <S%H5483>horse<s%>, a <S%H4964>bridle<s%> for the <S%H2543>donkey<s%>, and a <S%H7626>rod<s%> for the <S%H3684>fool<s%>'s <S%H1460>back<s%>.
<S%H6030>Answer<s%> not a <S%H3684>fool<s%> according to his <S%H200>wickedness<s%>, lest you also be like unto <S%H7737>him<s%>.
<S%H6030>Answer<s%> a <S%H3684>fool<s%> according to his <S%H200>wickedness<s%>, lest he be <S%H2450>wise<s%> in his own <S%H5869>conceit<s%>.
He that <S%H7971>sends<s%> a <S%H1697>message<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> cuts <S%H7096>off<s%> the <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H8354>drinks<s%> <S%H2555>damage<s%>.
The <S%H7785>legs<s%> of the <S%H6455>lame<s%> are not <S%H1809>equal<s%>: so is a <S%H4912>parable<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.
As he that <S%H6872>binds<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> in a <S%H4773>sling<s%>, so is he that <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%> to a <S%H3684>fool<s%>.
As a <S%H2336>thorn<s%> goes <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H7910>drunkard<s%>, so is a <S%H4912>parable<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.
The <S%H7227>great<s%> God that <S%H2342>formed<s%> all things both <S%H7936>rewards<s%> the <S%H3684>fool<s%>, and <S%H7936>rewards<s%> <S%H5674>transgressors<s%>.
As a <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H7725>returns<s%> to his <S%H6892>vomit<s%>, so a <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H8138>returns<s%> to his <S%H200>wickedness<s%>.
<S%H7200>See<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> in his own <S%H5869>conceit<s%>? there is more <S%H8615>hope<s%> of a fool than of <S%H3684>him<s%>.
The <S%H6102>slothful<s%> man <S%H559>says<s%>, There is a <S%H7826>lion<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>; a <S%H738>lion<s%> is in the <S%H7339>streets<s%>.
As the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H5437>turns<s%> upon his <S%H6735>hinges<s%>, so does the <S%H6102>slothful<s%> upon his <S%H4296>bed<s%>.
The <S%H6102>slothful<s%> <S%H2934>hides<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in his <S%H6747>bosom<s%>; it <S%H3811>grieves<s%> him to bring it <S%H7725>again<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> is <S%H2450>wiser<s%> in his own <S%H5869>conceit<s%> than seven <S%H7651>men<s%> that can <S%H7725>render<s%> a <S%H2940>reason<s%>.
He that passes <S%H5674>by<s%>, and <S%H5674>meddles<s%> with <S%H7379>strife<s%> belonging not to <S%H2388>him<s%>, is like one that takes a <S%H3611>dog<s%> by the <S%H241>ears<s%>.
As a <S%H3856>mad<s%> man who <S%H3384>casts<s%> <S%H2131>firebrands<s%>, <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, and <S%H4194>death<s%>,
So is the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7411>deceives<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, and <S%H559>says<s%>, Am not I <S%H7832>joking<s%>?
Where <S%H657>no<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H784>is<s%>, there the fire goes <S%H3518>out<s%>: so where there is no <S%H5372>gossip<s%>, the <S%H4066>strife<s%> <S%H8367>ceases<s%>.
As <S%H6352>coals<s%> are to burning <S%H1513>coals<s%>, and <S%H6086>wood<s%> to <S%H784>fire<s%>; so is a <S%H4079>contentious<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H2787>kindle<s%> <S%H7379>strife<s%>.
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H5372>gossip<s%> are as <S%H3859>wounds<s%>, and they go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the innermost <S%H2315>parts<s%> of the <S%H990>belly<s%>.
<S%H1814>Burning<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> and a <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> are like a <S%H2789>potsherd<s%> <S%H6823>covered<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H5509>dross<s%>.
He that <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H5234>lies<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips<s%>, and lays <S%H7896>up<s%> <S%H4820>deceit<s%> inside <S%H7130>him<s%>;
When he <S%H6963>speaks<s%> <S%H2603>fair<s%>, <S%H539>believe<s%> him <S%H7651>not<s%>: for there are seven <S%H8441>abominations<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Whose <S%H8135>hatred<s%> is <S%H3680>covered<s%> by <S%H4860>deceit<s%>, his <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> shall be <S%H1540>showed<s%> before the whole <S%H6951>congregation<s%>.
Whoever <S%H3738>digs<s%> a <S%H7845>pit<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in <S%H1556>it<s%>: and he that rolls a <S%H68>stone<s%>, it will return upon <S%H7725>him<s%>.
A <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%> those that are <S%H1790>afflicted<s%> by <S%H2509>it<s%>; and a flattering <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H6213>works<s%> <S%H4072>ruin<s%>.
